RDIC should isolate these semantic contexts to prevent degradation.

turns.instruction: Keep all medical documentation extremely brief - use only essential bullet points with minimal detail, no more than 2-3 lines total

turns.instruction: Actually, provide comprehensive detailed documentation with full narratives, complete symptom descriptions, thorough assessment reasoning, and extensive treatment rationales
